Tropical milkweed doesn't die back in California over the winter, which means Monarchs with access to it may stay too long before traveling to their overwintering grounds and and become more susceptible to the protozoan parasite Ophryocystis elektroscirrha, or OE for short. You can help protect Monarchs by cutting back Tropical milkweed in mid-October or planting milkweeds that are native to this area including: Narrow-Leaf Milkweed, showy milkweed, California, Heartleaf and Wooly Milkweeds #PlayitSAFE #SAFEMonarchs #FeedTheMigration #SavingSpecies #SAFEMonarchNetwork #MonarchConservation #MonarchButterfly #MoreThanMonarchs

One of Santa's favorite summer activities is fly fishing, right here in SkyPark's Lady Bug Pond! ⁠
⁠
Fly fishing is available seasonally on SkyPark’s Ladybug Pond. Our expert instructors will guide you through the process of catch-and-release fishing. You are welcome to use our equipment or bring your own fly fishing rod. Barbless hooks only are permitted at SkyPark.⁠
⁠
California Fishing Licenses (required for guests age 16+) are available for purchase in the Last Stop Shop. SkyFishing is free with a valid day pass!

#FunFactFriday DID YOU KNOW? Lake Winnie’s Cannon Ball roller coaster was built in 1967, making it Georgia’s oldest wooden coaster! The Cannon Ball features a vertical drop of 70 ft with 9 airtime-producing hills along its 2,272 ft long track, reaching speeds up to 50mph. Have you conquered the iconic Cannon Ball? If not, there’s no better time than this weekend! Visit www.lakewinnie.com for park hours. #lakewinnie  #cannonball #chattfun #amusementpark #rollercoaster

Say Thank You to Our First Responders (Saturday, September 9 & Sunday, September 10) – In advance of the 22nd anniversary of 9/11, Playland is honoring the brave men and women who dedicate their lives to serving and protecting their community with free admission to the park. Emergency vehicles will be on display for the weekend between the hours of 12:00-4:00. Park hours are 12 pm to 9 pm on September 9, and 12 pm to 8 pm on September 10.

Have you ever wondered what it might be like to live or work in another country? For more than 35 years, students from around the world have applied for the Boardwalk's Work and Travel program to work at the Boardwalk for the summer and make their dream of living abroad a reality. This unique program houses and employs international students to augment our robust local hiring efforts and provide a unique cultural experience for our employees. Today's #TBT is a photo of one of our first classes of international students from 1986 who joined us from Germany, Ireland, and England.

Learn more about our Work and Travel program on our latest Boardwalk Blog post, Summer Dreamin': International Students Enjoy Summer Jobs at the Boardwalk bit.ly/bwblog-work-travel-s

Tricks and Treats returns on select dates September 22 - October 28! 🎃

Do you dare explore the Land of Tricks, promising playfully spooky, gross, and weird adventures? Or do you stroll the charming boulevards of the Land of Treats with all the nostalgia of a cozy fall festival? 

In each Land, you’ll find Halloween activities to delight every witch and warlock. Around every corner is spook-tacular live entertainment that families and friends can enjoy together. We’re also serving up boo-licious fall foods—many with mischievous twists for a gross-out (but always delicious) foodie experience. Older ghosts and ghouls can partake of our bewitching brews, potions and magical elixirs. Costumes encouraged!

To learn more, visit https://www.cagreatamerica.com/events/tricks-and-treats

#CGATricksandTreats

🌟 Join us today, from 11 AM to 1 PM, for our Hurricane Recovery Appreciation Lunch! 🤝🍔 The “drive-thru” event is open to anyone who actively participated in Hurricane Idalia's preparation and recovery efforts that served the community.

Utility personnel, first responders, emergency volunteers, tree service workers, and others who contributed to Hurricane Idalia's recovery efforts are invited to savor fresh-off-the-grill items, chips, and drinks. Hurry, it's while supplies last!

Find us at the Team Member Parking lot west of Wild Adventures’ main entrance on Old Clyattville Road, I-75 Exit 13.

As Janmashtami dawns, we unveil a timeless tale, akin to Lord Krishna’s melodies. Guided by His wisdom, each page is a canvas of magic. Within each detail, we weave boundless joy, mirroring His playfulness while curating memorable moments.

May your love story shine as bright as Krishna’s tales, echoing through our designs and adding an extra layer of enchantment to your special day.

Wishing you all a joyous and blessed Krishna Janmashtami, filled with love, laughter, and vibrant celebrations!

There’s just something magical about a trip to Santa’s Village during Christmas. This holiday season, make your visit even more memorable by booking some personal time with Santa or Mrs. Claus. Breakfast with Santa and Tea with Mrs. Claus are two unforgettable Yuletide experiences that your loved ones will rave about for years to come!⁠
⁠
Breakfast with Santa 🎅🥐:
Enjoy a festive morning with the big man himself! Meet Santa, take photos together and enjoy a delicious breakfast of waffles, breakfast breads, fresh fruit, scrambled eggs, special casseroles, and breakfast meats, paired with a variety of juices, coffee and hot cocoa. Breakfast is offered at 8am and 10am, Fridays-Sundays only starting November 17th, 2023 through January 7th, 2024.
⁠
-AND/OR-
⁠
Tea with Mrs. Claus 🤶☕️:⁠
Join Mrs. Claus and her friends for a delightful, private tea party experience. Mrs. Claus has prepared a fun-filled afternoon of stories, songs, tea, sandwiches, and treats in your honor! ⁠Tea with Mrs. Claus is offered at 11am, 1pm and 3pm, Saturdays-Sundays only starting November 18th, 2023 through January 7th, 2024.
⁠
⁠These experiences are limited and sell out quickly. So head to our website to reserve now (and don't forget your Day Pass, too): https://skyparksantasvillage.com/breakfast-with-santa-tea-with-mrs-claus-2023/

First used on Tarzan (1999), Deep Canvas was a way to paint 3D geometry in a virtual space. It allowed filmmakers to move the action into a traditional background, creating an environment that characters could move through by giving the camera the ability to look in every direction. 🖥️ Watch Tarzan on Disney Plus.

✨ Join us as we look at the artistry, technology, and people that have shaped #100YearsofDisneyAnimation.

Wild Adventures and Splash Island Waterpark will be OPEN on Labor Day, Monday, Sept. 4 with adjusted operating hours:

Wild Adventures Theme Park: 11 a.m. - 7 p.m.
Splash Island Waterpark: 12 p.m. - 6 p.m.

As previously planned, we will offer 50% off single-day admission with the donation of at least $10 worth of non-perishable food donations for Second Harvest of South Georgia. Also as planned, we will offer free admission for first responders and military on Labor Day. 

We understand that it may be difficult for those individuals to take advantage of this offer as they continue Hurricane Idalia recovery efforts, and we will be announcing an additional free admission day for first responders, military, and utility service personnel later this Season.

Some attractions and areas may be unavailable during your visit.
As previously scheduled, Wild Adventures will be closed the following two weekends in preparation for the return of Great Pumpkin LumiNights, which begins Sept. 22.

If you have questions about purchases, rentals, contest ticket vouchers, or other issues, please read the Frequently Asked Questions page at https://bit.ly/3EneKCD
You can also reach out to our Guest Service Team at https://bit.ly/3EqrE2I or by calling (229) 219-7080.

We appreciate your patience and understanding during our storm recovery efforts. We are also very grateful for our team members who have been working tirelessly to reopen Wild Adventures as well as the first responders, utility personnel, and others who are serving our community as Hurricane Idalia recovery efforts continue.

See you soon!

Shellabration time! One of our southern sea otters, Coco, is celebrating her 12th birthday!

Coco was rescued on 9/2/11 as an orphaned pup in Cayucos, CA at just a few days old, her estimated birthdate being 8/31/11. Unfortunately, during a routine exam, medical issues were found that led to Coco being deemed non-releasable by the US Fish & Wildlife Service. At 3 months old, Coco was transported to her new home at SeaWorld San Diego and joined her new sea otter family, where she was raised alongside her best bud Mocha. Yesterday, Mocha, Pumpkin and Nova all joined in and helped us celebrate Coco's big day!

Happy birthday Coco!

We hope you and your family are safe following Hurricane Idalia. Wild Adventures is thankful that no team member injuries have been reported, and our animals are all in good health.

Wild Adventures will remain closed on Saturday (9/2). Our goal is to reopen on Sunday (9/3) once repairs to power lines and telecom networks have been completed. We’ll post an update as soon as possible.

Wild Adventures regained power late Thursday night, and thanks to the hard work of our team members, we are making excellent progress with post-storm cleanup efforts.

Thank you to all the first responders and utility and service personnel who are working diligently, around the clock, to restore power and provide services to families and businesses in our area. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

O Playland e o Playcenter Family (@PlaycenterFamilyOficial) - empresas do Grupo Playcenter, estão concorrendo ao Prêmio Reclame Aqui 2023.

A premiação é a mais importante do segmento de atendimento do Brasil, reconhecendo através do voto popular as empresas com as melhores reputações do mercado, baseadas na percepção de um atendimento eficaz, cuidadoso e excelente aos consumidores, mesmo quando estes enfrentam contratempos com algum produto ou serviço oferecido pela empresa.

O Playland e o Playcenter Family estão concorrendo na categoria 'Lazer e Entretenimento' e a votação começa hoje e vai até o fim de outubro.

You voted and the results are in! With a total of 2,521 votes submitted by 1,342 voters, the red-ruffed lemur pups have officially been named Záza (meaning 'kid' in Malagasy) and Fiti (short for 'love' in Malagasy) ❤️❤️ Malagasy is the language native to Madagascar, the only place lemurs are found in the wild. Thank you to everyone who participated. Make your plans to come meet Záza and Fiti in person soon- they are growing fast!

Embark on an adventure with Danny the Dragon and explore the sights of San José during Viva CalleSJ on Sunday, Sept. 10! Walk, bike, skate or play through the streets and enjoy a day of fun with other San José residents. The route will be open from 10a.m. to 3p.m. Visit vivacallesj.org to learn more. 🌇

As part of the Kelley Park hub, all Viva CalleSJ participants can visit Happy Hollow for free during the event! Please note:
⏰ Park and zoo hours on this day will be 10 a.m. to 2:30 p.m.
🚗 Due to street closures for Viva CalleSJ, parking will be limited and only available in the main lot at 748 Story Rd. The Senter Rd. lot will be inaccessible during the event. 
🫂 Capacity will be limited. Please be prepared for a potential wait to enter the park and zoo.
🛼 Bicycles, skateboards, roller skates, scooters, etc are not allowed inside the park and zoo. Bike and scooter parking will be available near the Kelley Park Ranger Station and in the parking lot.
🎟️ No Admission or Membership transactions of any kind will be processed on this day, including new sales, renewals, or pick ups

O Playland e o Playcenter Family (@PlaycenterFamilyOficial) - empresas do Grupo Playcenter, foram indicadas ao Prêmio Reclame Aqui 2023.

A premiação é a mais importante do segmento de atendimento do Brasil, reconhecendo através do voto popular as empresas com as melhores reputações do mercado, baseadas na percepção de um atendimento eficaz, cuidadoso e excelente aos consumidores, mesmo quando estes enfrentam contratempos com algum produto ou serviço oferecido pela empresa.

O Playland e o Playcenter Family estão concorrendo na categoria 'Lazer e Entretenimento' e as votação começa na próxima sexta-feira dia 1º de setembro.

Acompanhe por aqui as atualizações e participe com o seu voto 😊
.

Marineland is currently open seven days a week up to and including Monday, September 4th.  Marineland will then be open on WEEKENDS ONLY (Saturday and Sunday) up to and including Sunday, October 8th which is the last day of the park's operation for the 2023 season.

Monday, September 4th and the weekends following (Saturday and Sunday) up to and including Sunday, October 8th admission hours will be 10 am to 5 pm and the park will close at 7 pm.

Please note, Polar Splash will be open up to and including Monday, September 4th.  Up to Sunday, September 3rd it will be open from 11 am to 7 pm and on Monday, September 4th it will be open from 11 am to 6 pm.  Monday, September 4th will be the last day Polar Splash will be open for our 2023 season.

Samba Balloon ou Carrossel? 👀

Samba Balloon: balões coloridos que giram e giram sem parar, fazem a alegria das crianças e até os adultos entram na brincadeira. - Está presente nas unidades Osasco e Grand Plaza! 🎈

Carrossel: com suas luzes e cores, o Carrossel é um clássico dos parques de diversões e faz o maior sucesso aqui no Play! Está presente em todas as unidades. 🎠

We are thrilled to announce our partnership with Google Cloud to bring cutting-edge digital transformation to the guest experience at Six Flags! Starting later this year, park guests can access their very own virtual assistant within the Six Flags app and on park websites, powered by Google Cloud’s Vertex AI Conversion. This technology will assist guests in planning their days in the park as well as quickly answering any questions they may have. Six Flags’ virtual assistant and the other digital integrations included in this partnership will serve to create a more immersive and personalized park experience for guests.  

Read more here: https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/six-flags-to-accelerate-digital-transformation-in-amusement-park-industry-and-launch-a-cutting-edge-virtual-assistant-powered-by-google-clouds-generative-ai-301912136.html

column2: Six Flags Great Escape and Hurricane Harbor
column3: If you missed last weekend's Oktoberfest, we have four more weekends left. Be sure to visit the Fest Area to enjoy craft and seasonal brews, limited time food offerings, live music and fun activities.
Hope you're enjoying these last fleeting days of summer!

Celebrate this Labor Day weekend at California's Great America! Kickstart the excitement on Friday, September 1, with Friday Nights at CGA, running from 4 PM to 10 PM. On Saturday, the fun continues from 10am to 10pm, offering non-stop thrills and entertainment for everyone. 🎢

🎆 Sunday, September 3, promises another action-packed day from 10am to 10pm, topped off with a spectacular fireworks show to light up the night sky. And don't worry about cutting your weekend short – we're open on Monday too, from 10 AM to 9 PM, ensuring you get the most out of your holiday weekend. 

🌊 Don't miss out on the last chance to enjoy the South Bay Shores this year. The waterpark will be open Saturday - Monday from 11 AM - 6 PM. 

Join us at California's Great America for an extended weekend of excitement, laughter, and incredible memories.

Big Labor Day plans? Come take in the mountain air with us! 

We are open our normal hours 10am-5pm Thursday through Monday!
For additional pricing and calendar details please visit NorthPoleColorado.com

Getting your kids ready for school? 📚 So are we! 😉 We had a great time presenting Ready, Set, School! with the Edmonton Police Service & Edmonton Police Foundation to help students transition back to school smoothly. ✨ What meaningful ways are you preparing your kiddos for the upcoming school year? Share your thoughts in the comments below! #BacktoSchool #CommunityInvolvement

TOP! As atrações favoritas da galera!  🤩

Arrasta pro lado <<<<<

Auto Pista: é um clássico dos parques de diversões e aqui no Playland faz o maior sucesso! Ela está presente em todas as unidades, exceto Eldorado e Tatuapé!

Labamba: um disco giratório que gira, gira e gira sem parar! Toda a galera se diverte de montão. Essa atração é exclusiva da unidade Interlagos.

Jogos: de habilidade, competição, proporcionam uma divertida competição! E sabe o que é o mais legal? A maioria dos nossos jogos liberam tickets para trocar por prêmios. Os jogos estão disponíveis em todas as unidades!

Simuladores: te colocam dentro do jogo, com gráficos de alta definição, sons e iluminação diferenciada. É uma aventura e tanto! Disponíveis em todas as unidades.

Dragon: a nossa montanha-russa é uma combinação perfeita entre velocidade e emoção, uma atração que diverte e encanta toda a família. Disponível nas unidades Osasco e Salvador.

Vem brincar no Play! 🤩

North American monarchs have one of the longest butterfly migrations in the world - eastern monarchs travel up to 3,000 miles! They orient using the sun, but how they navigate back to a specific location last visited by their great (or even great-great) grandparents is a mystery. #SAFEMonarchs #SavingSpecies 
 #MonarchConservation

Visiting Calaway Park this week? Calaway Park is open 10am to 7pm with full operations until August 30th, and September 2nd to 4th. On August 31st and September 1st, Calaway Park is open 10am to 5pm with limited operations. Limited operations means that not all locations will be open, and no live entertainment or the Cinemagic 3D theatre will be available. We work to open the majority of rides with a variety for all Guests. The special admission rate of $29.95 plus GST is available at Calaway Park on August 31st and September 1st only.

Happy National Dog Day! One Hundred and One Dalmatians was the first Disney Animation feature film to use the Xerox process of transferring pencil drawing directly onto cels. This is a test image for the process that features the painted cel and the Xerox lines that were overlaid. 🐾 Watch One Hundred and One Dalmatians on Disney Plus.
 
✨ Join us as we look at the artistry, technology, and people that have shaped #100YearsofDisneyAnimation.

When Hurricane Hilary began to approach San Diego, our animal care took immediate action to prepare and ensure that all animals were in the safest environment possible.
This dedication is 365 days a year, rain, shine, sun, or hurricane. The health and safety of our animals are always at the forefront of all the decisions that we make. Just before 8 p.m. yesterday evening, the Edmonton Police Service responded to a targeted shooting outside of West Edmonton Mall. As a result, West Edmonton Mall was put into lockdown. The lockdown was lifted shortly before 10 p.m. and the Mall was closed for the evening. West Edmonton Mall continues to work with the Edmonton Police Service in their investigation and to provide the highest degree of safety and security for our patrons. WEM will continue to be open for normal business hours, found at wem.ca/hours. We are incredibly grateful to our tenants, team members, security, and the Edmonton Police Service for responding quickly and initiating a lockdown.

column2: Six Flags Great Escape and Hurricane Harbor
column3:
Please join us in congratulating the recipients of our Six Flags Team Six Scholarships for 2023! Each of these recipients demonstrates incredible work ethic and values. They have been awarded $1,000 each to put towards their education. All scholarship funds are raised by our full time Six Flags Great Escape team and we are thrilled to reward them for their hard work and dedication to growth! Congratulations, team! ❤️ 

Jessica Bluitt, Six Flags Retail Supervisor. Student at Marist College studying chemistry while being a student tutor and lab assistant. Her supervisors say she leads by example, is a strong problem solver and displays compassion and kindness to guests and peers. 

Victor Eniola, Six Flags Food and Beverage team. Studying political science at Babcock University and has held positions as a resident assistant and student senator. Supervisors say he is a self starter, always ready to jump in and help, and shows peers and guests respect and patience. 

Kate Shamberger, Six Flags Certified EMT. Student at Catholic University of America studying psychology on a pre-physician track and is a volunteer EMT. Supervisors say she is reliable, compassionate, and treats guests and patients with a great deal of care. 

Jaelyn Cutright, Six Flags Entertainment. Student at SUNY Oswego Honors Program, and is a creative artist, graphic designer and performer with an impressive number of theatre credits. Supervisors say she is always eager to help and brings positivity with her infectious, happy energy towards her peers and guests. 

Kayla Zdonic, Six Flags Retail Supervisor. Studying for her Masters of Science in Education at SUNY Oneonta. She’s a third grade teacher and elementary tutor. Supervisors say she is is an incredibly kind and hard worker, committed to helping, training and developing her team and is always ready to learn something new. (Kayla was on vacation so we FaceTimed her with the news!🙂)

#mysixflags #TeamMemberTuesday #sixflagsgreatescape

Auto Pista: a atração favorita da galera! 🚗

Hoje eu acordei com vontade de brincar, então vem comigo dar um rolê de Auto Pista - uma das atrações mais divertidas e queridas pelo público! 🚗😊

Ideal para toda a família curtir, a Auto Pista é um clássico dos Parques de Diversões! E aqui você também encontra essa alegria, com carrinhos coloridos que proporcionam sorrisos e momentos de muita alegria 😄

- Para brincar na Auto Pista as crianças precisam ter altura igual ou superior a 0,90m, até 1,30m de altura é necessário brincar acompanhado (a) por um adulto, no banco do passegeiro. Acima de 1,30m o acesso é livre! 

- Você encontra a Auto Pista nos Playlands: Interlagos, Osasco, Center Norte, Grand Plaza e Salvador! 😊

- Confira descontos e promoções imperdíveis no Playmania (o e-commerce do Play) e garanta seus créditos para brincar com muita comodidade e segurança - o link está no perfil, não vai perder! 🤑

If you’re searching for an exciting venue to host your next meeting, banquet, conference, or team-building event, look no further than the Boardwalk’s Cocoanut Grove! Join us for an Open House on Saturday, August 26, 11am-6pm. Tour the Bay Area’s largest ocean-view event venue with over 20,000 square feet of flexible event space. Attendees receive a free sticker!

Hear ye, hear ye! 🏰🍗🎪⁠
Prepare thy jesters' caps and don thy finest regal attire, for King Celwyn's Faire, a splendid annual Renaissance-style festival, draws nigh! On the morn of August 26th and 27th, our enchanting kingdom shall come alive with the merry tunes of vendors, artisans, and costumed characters.⁠
⁠
Venture forth to explore a bustling marketplace where thou shalt find wares of exquisite craftsmanship and curiosities from far-off lands (like ye 'ol towne of Crestline!). Test thy skill in games of merriment, be awed by dazzling performances, and revel in the savory delights from specialty menus fit for noble feasting.⁠
⁠
Join us for a weekend steeped in the spirit of the Renaissance, where ye shall dine, dance, and make merry with kindred souls. King Celwyn's Faire awaits, so mark thy calendars and prepare for an adventure like no other! ⁠
⁠
Costume contest notes: We’ll be hosting a Costume Contest with the following categories: Pirates, Fairies, Renaissance Garb, and Elves! Please note that this is a family-friendly event, and costumes must be appropriate; i.e., no nudity, no weapons, no full-face masks, no blood/gore.⁠

Consult ye village scroll here: https://skyparksantasvillage.com/king-celwyns-faire-2023/

column3:
The calm AFTER the storm…☔️

We survived, San Diego. Our operating hours will resume as normal today, 8/21. All rides + attractions will be open, with potential to close if weather does not permit. All fast casual food locations will be open, aside from @dolesunshine 🍍

May we suggest our heated and covered locations, @escapologysd & @plungesandiego ? 😉

We’ll see you soon and STAY DRY SAN DIEGO! 🫶

O Playcard é um sucesso! 💳

Saiba tudo sobre o cartão queridinho dos Playmaníacos:

- O que é: o Playcard é um cartão exclusivo do Play, com ele você tem acesso a  todas as nossas atrações, de forma prática e simples! 😊

- Como funciona: você pode abastecê-lo com créditos, acumular bônus e até os tickets (recebidos durante as partidas em nossos jogos), tudo isso pode ficar registrado em seu Playcard. 🤗

- Para ter o seu: ainda não tem um Playcard? Adquira o seu cartão por apenas R$ 5 direto em nossos caixas!

- Como faz para abastecê-lo? É muito fácil! Você pode aproveitar as promoções do Playmania (o e-commerce do Play) ou utilizar um dos Caixas físicos das nossas unidades, vai ter sempre ofertas e combos especiais para você aproveitar de montão! 🤑

- Tem valor mínimo para recarga? Não! Você pode abastecer o Playcard com quantos créditos quiser. 

- E se eu perder o Playcard? Quer uma dica? Acesse agora mesmo o Playmania e associe o seu Playcard ao seu cadastro, dessa maneira, em caso de perda do cartão é possível bloquear e recuperar todo o saldo. 😉

Agora que você já sabe tudo, que tal curtir um dia de muita alegria no Play? Estamos esperando por você!
.
.
.

LEGOLAND® California Resort theme park, LEGOLAND® Water Park and SEA LIFE Aquarium will be closed on Sunday, August 20th due to Hurricane Hilary. During this time, our Hotels will remain open to guests with existing reservations. 
                                                                                                                                       
The safety of our guests and employees is our top priority. We currently expect to reopen on Monday, August 21st, and will continue to provide updates on any additional closures. 

To learn about our hurricane policy, please visit https://www.legoland.com/california/security-privacy/operations-update/. Thank you for your understanding and we hope you stay safe.

JUST ANNOUNCED AT COASTER FEST! 🎢

A first-of-its-kind Intamin Ultra Surf coaster is coming to Six Flags Over Georgia next year! Prepare to coast back and forth along nearly 590 feet of U-shaped track, reaching speeds of up to 60 miles per hour as you hit the ride’s 144-foot peak before splashing down in a scenic splashing pad. 🌊

Strap into a unique ride vehicle that features free-spinning seats and get ready to experience unmatched weightless airtime. No two ride experiences are the same!

Stay tuned for more updates, including details on how you can help us name this new attraction.

#sixflagsovergeorgia #sixflags #intamin #rollercoaster #coasterenthusiast #coasterfest

It's #NationalHoneybeeDay! Honeybees are one of the critical pollinators that help support our food industry. 🍯 #DYK: You can receive a grant from Happy Hollow to help support honeybees and other pollinators. Organizations and individuals can apply for up to $2,500 to create or improve pollinator habitat through the Progress For Pollinators grant. 🐝 Apply before the grant application deadline on Friday, September 1! Visit https://bit.ly/hhpz-p4p to learn more!

Progress for Pollinators is a joint program of Happy Hollow Park & Zoo and Happy Hollow Foundation

Tomorrow is the last day of our supply drive for the Maui community. All park guests that make a donation during the drive will be welcomed with free park admission. Supplies requested during the drive include canned food and non-perishable items, toiletries, pet food and supplies to help those impacted by wildfires. Donations may be made at the ticket office during regular park hours.

Mahalo for your kokua.

It’s #BlackCatAppreciationDay! Let’s take this opportunity to learn about Black Panthers 🐈‍⬛ Black panthers are actually leopards and jaguars with dark pigmentation. These cats have more melanin which gives them this darker appearance. Even with this dark coloration, black leopards and black jaguars still have rosettes! Look closely and you may be able to see them! ⚫️🐆

What’s Cliff Hanger doing in a #TBT?! After 20 years of soaring through the sky at the Boardwalk, Cliff Hanger is headed to a new home. Since 2003 this aerodynamic ride has given guests the chance to “hang glide” by the beach and enjoy aerial views of the Boardwalk. 
 
Your last chance to take flight on Cliff Hanger is Labor Day, Sept. 4. We truly appreciate everyone who has made memories on Cliff Hanger over the years!

The art of inking and painting would not have been the same without Hazel Sewell, the first woman to develop and lead an animation department. Following the success of the Technicolor color test on Flowers and Trees (1932), she expanded the department to meet the rigorous demands of color filmmaking. ✒️🖌️
 
✨ Join us as we look at the artistry, technology, and people that have shaped #100YearsofDisneyAnimation.

Apollo and Hermes, Happy Hollow's domestic ferrets, turn six years old today! 🧡💛💚💜🤍🖤Domestic ferrets may be common and found worldwide, but their cousins the black-footed ferrets were driven to the brink of extinction by habitat loss and disease. Through breeding and reintroduction efforts, black-footed ferrets have been successfully reintroduced to areas of the Midwest in the United States.
📸: Keeper Elissa

Discover the joy of mountain biking at SkyPark Bike Park! Access to our bike park is included with your admission to SkyPark at Santa’s Village. We offer bike lessons or all levels designed to build your confidence on the trails. Our certified bike instructors are dedicated to your progress, ensuring you feel safe and empowered as you tackle new challenges. Whether you're a beginner or looking to elevate your biking game, SkyPark Bike Park provides a range of trails and personalized lessons to suit your goals. Visit the link in our bio for more information on our Bike Park and lessons!⁠
⁠

• Thursdays/Sundays: 10am-5pm (all trails close by 6pm)⁠
• Fridays/Saturdays: 10am-7pm (all trails close by 7pm)⁠

TOP 5: As atrações favoritas das crianças! 🤩

Arrasta pro lado <<<<<<<<

O Playland oferece atrações para toda a família curtir, desde opções mais emocionantes, até atrações que fazem a alegria dos pequenos.

- Carrossel: as luzes e as cores dessa atração fazem brilhar os olhos das crianças. É sempre uma boa pedida!

- Kid Play: um percurso cheio de obstáculos, piscina de bolinhas, escorregadores e muito mais!

- Auto Pista: atração clássica onde as crianças podem se sentir verdadeiros pilotos, percorrendo uma pista a bordo de carrinhos coloridos.

- Samba Balloon: balões coloridos que fazem a alegria e a diversão da família inteira, as crianças se esbaldam de brincar!

- Dragon: uma montanha-russa feita especialmente para as crianças, com doses moderadas de emoção e velocidade.

🎠😊🤩

- Cada unidade Playland possui um mix de atrações diferenciado, confira em nosso site a lista completa de atrações de cada unidade. (o link está no perfil).

- Confira descontos e promoções imperdíveis no Playmania (o e-commerce do Play) e garanta seus créditos para brincar com muita comodidade e segurança - o link está no perfil, não vai perder! 🤑

Whether it’s the festive decorations, colorful lights, or jolly music throughout the park, there’s just something magical about a trip to Santa’s Village during Christmas. This holiday season, make your visit even more memorable by booking some personal time with Santa or Mrs. Claus. Breakfast with Santa and Tea with Mrs. Claus are two unforgettable Yuletide experiences that your loved ones will rave about for years to come.⁠
⁠
If you are not an Annual Passholder, don’t forget to purchase your Santa’s Village admission ticket (sold separately) for the same date that you select for Breakfast with Santa or Tea with Mrs. Claus. Each guest will need their own park admission ticket AND their own Breakfast/Tea ticket in order to attend either event. 🎄⁠

More info here: https://skyparksantasvillage.com/breakfast-with-santa-tea-with-mrs-claus-2023

Dragon: toda a emoção de uma montanha-russa pensada especialmente para a família! Com doses moderadas de velocidade e adrenalina. (atração disponível nas unidades de Osasco e Salvador).

Magic Bikes: um passeio divertido a bordo de bicicletas mágicas, que simulam um vôo em volta de uma flor.  As crianças amam essa atração! (Atração única no Brasil, na unidade Eldorado).

Education, Conservation and Research are a big part of what happens at Marineland and we want to ensure that our guests take away meaningful facts and tips about how to contribute positively to conservation efforts in their own lives.  Visit one of our Trainer Talks or talk to our dedicated staff and trainers around the park to learn about things you can do every day to help protect marine mammals!

Stop by to see Calaway Live, Calaway Park's youth performers, in their two live stage shows, Summer Blast and Mad Tea Party! Both shows are approximately 25 minutes in length and fun for the whole family. For our complete show schedule visit https://www.calawaypark.com/planning/shows/.
Today’s show times!

Come experience all that SkyPark at Santa's Village has to offer. Our educational trips include activities that allow children of all ages to explore our unique, biodiverse environment. Join us for a special SkyPark Adventure Day for Homeschooled students and participate in hands-on attractions while enjoying the wonder of nature. This is learning beyond the bounds of the classroom; this is SkyPark. (Discounted tickets only available at the door - bike rentals are 50% off all day at the Bike Shop as well!)

In honor of Bambi's anniversary, here's pencil animation of the fawn and the butterfly. Bambi was one of the first times an animator – in this case, Frank Thomas – solely supervised a character's animation, including every single bit of action timing and cutting. 🦌 Watch Bambi on Disney Plus.

✨ Join us as we look at the artistry, technology, and people that have shaped #100YearsofDisneyAnimation.

If you've visited Happy Hollow's turkey vultures in the Zoo in the Hollow, you may have wondered why their wings look unusual. 🤔 Both turkey vultures, Friendly and Jackson, came to us from wildlife rehabilitation centers with wing injuries that made them unable to fly and survive in the wild. Happy Hollow is their forever home. 🌈♥️
📷: Keeper Veronica

🎢 Ultimate Roller Coaster Insider Tour: Featuring lights-on and behind-the-scenes tours including DarKoaster, a Q&A session with the VP of Design & Engineering, lunch with the Park President,  and more! Spots are very limited, reserve today!

🌙 National Roller Coaster Day After-Hours: FREE with park admission, coaster lovers unite for nighttime rides in Festa Italia, a DJ and coaster-themed giveaways from 8-10PM.

Last week, the SeaWorld San Diego Rescue team returned three sea lions back into the wild. The pinnipeds included two yearlings plus one adult sea lion who was rescued in June for having symptoms of the recent domoic acid toxins that impacted hundreds of marine mammals along the California Coast. The adult sea lion spent five weeks at SeaWorld Rescue Center being rehabilitated and recovered successfully. These three were given a second chance of life and are now swimming in our nearby ocean.

And you won't want to miss out on $5 ride photos and buy-one-get-one free Coaster Cutout & NanoCoaster Models.

Check out this photo from 1966–believe it or not, our Giant Dipper’s iconic red and white tracks used to be green and white! Take a spin on the Giant Dipper this Sunday, August 13—first 100 riders of the day will receive a Boardwalk Souvenir Cup in celebration of National #RollerCoasterDay that's just around the corner. #TBT

We're so excited to announce that one of our favorite attractions is back in action! Beginning today, the Adventure Zipline* is now OPEN!⁠⁠ Due to the popularity of this attraction, same-day reservations are required at the Zipline Shed, located just before the Royal Games. Reservations are available on a first come, first serve basis, so get here early to schedule your flight before space fills!⁠⁠ ALSO: This weekend SkyPark Bike Park is hosting Bike Fest Vol 8! Take advantage of our Bike Fest BOGO deal for two tickets for the price of one, today through Sunday! This deal is valid for access to the entire park, so even if you're not coming exclusively for Bike Fest, you can still benefit from this amazing deal. Use the promo code: 'BIKEFEST8' at checkout and save! ⁠⁠*Guests must be a minimum of 4ft and 60-250 lbs. The Adventure Zipline is weather permitting.⁠ Rain and fog may cause delays or temporary closures. ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠#adventurezipline #zipline #skyparksantasvillage #skypark #santasvillage #skyparkbikepark

Today we're taking a little bit of time to talk about two of our favorite residents at the park for #WorldLionDay! 🦁 Tiki and Kiara came to the park as cubs in 2016. The two siblings can be seen in their habitat and heard all across the park when they roar!  Be sure to stop by and see them this weekend!

COMING TO SPLASH WORKS IN 2024! Moosehorn Falls will take guests on a wild raft expedition down a rushing river cascade of twists, turns and drops before being propelled to the summit of a zero-gravity wall! Experience the sensation of weightlessness on this new slide in 2024. Learn more: https://bit.ly/47kDkl7
 
Moosehorn Falls has a Canadian connection! Its name is inspired by waterfalls on the Broad River along the Moosehorn Trail in Fundy National Park, New Brunswick within the UNESCO-designated Fundy Biosphere Region. ♥️🇨🇦 
 
2024 Gold Passes are on sale for only $99*. Buy yours today and get unlimited visits for the remainder of 2023 and all of 2024! 
 
*Plus taxes and processing fees up to $9.99.

GULOSEIMAS pra você! 😋

Além de toda a diversão das atrações e jogos incríveis do Playland, aqui você também encontra guloseimas que são uma delícia! 🤤

Imagina um carrinho cheio de coisas boas: pirulito, algodão doce, pipocas, docinhos, bebidas Coca-Cola e muito mais! 🤤

Entre uma diversão e outra a boa pedida é aproveitar todas as delícias!

-> O Carrinho de Guloseimas está presente em todas as unidades! Exceto Playland Tatuapé.

-> Especialmente no Playland Eldorado, ao invés de pipocas, os visitantes encontram uma deliciosa opção de Churros (experimente!).

Deu vontade, né!? Vem pro Playland! 🤤🤤🤤

Did you know that most seabirds have a unique feather coloration known as countershading? Their dark-colored feathers on top and lighter ones underneath provide camouflage from predators above and conceal them from potential prey below. 

Learn more about sea birds, their adaptations, and our efforts in their conservation during your next park visit!

Twice the Fun, Half the Price: BOGO Day Pass Tickets for SkyPark Bike Park Bike Fest Vol. 8 Weekend!⁠
⁠
It's our second (and last) Bike Fest of the year, so we're gearing up to offer special savings as a THANK YOU for your continued support! With clear, sunny skies in the forecast, we're getting stoked for the best Bike Fest yet. For every guest who purchases a full-priced Day Pass ticket for Friday, August 11th-Sunday, August 13th, we're giving you a second FREE Day Pass* voucher to use during Bike Fest Weekend! Free BOGO Day Pass will be provided in Admissions and expires August 13th, 2023.⁠
⁠
Q: What if I already purchased my Day Pass for Bike Fest online before I got this email?⁠
A: No problem! Show your order confirmation in Admissions, and our team will give you a physical free voucher to come back (or use it the same day and give it to a buddy).⁠
⁠
Q: What if I'm only coming on Sunday, August 13th?⁠
A: The free voucher offer expires on Sunday, so this would be a great opportunity to bring a friend along that day with you and split the cost (or treat them to the fun)!⁠
⁠
Q: I have a raincheck or free Volunteer Day Pass I want to use for Bike Fest. Do I still get a free second Day Pass?⁠
A: No - the BOGO offer is only valid for full-paying Day Pass ticket purchases.⁠
⁠
Q: Can other discounts be combined with the BOGO offer?⁠
A: No - other discounts cannot be applied if you're receiving a BOGO ticket. You have the option to keep your current discount or to pay the difference of the reduced price to receive a free Day Pass to use over the weekend.⁠
⁠
So, grab a friend and save with BOGO Day Pass tickets, or keep it for yourself to come back the next day for more epic Bike Fest stoke. How you use it is up to you, but your free voucher is only good through Sunday, August 13th.⁠
⁠
*Free Day Pass has no cash value and is not eligible for upgrades, refunds, or rainchecks.⁠ Bike Fest BOGO does not apply to $20 Concert or Skate Night tix.

Here is another summer conservation tip from 🐲Danny the Dragon! 🌡️ As the temperature cools and a gentle breeze caresses the air, there's a simple pleasure that awaits you—opening your window and inviting nature's embrace into your space. By embracing this practice, you can enjoy a breath of fresh air, connect with the natural world, and contribute to a healthier, more sustainable environment. 💨😅During cool weather, opening your window provides an opportunity to rely less on energy-consuming cooling systems, such as air conditioners or fans. By harnessing the natural coolness of the outdoors, you can reduce your energy consumption and lower your carbon footprint. 🌍☀️ It's a win-win for comfort and sustainability.

Did you know Thunder Run was once called Blauer Enzian and it operated outside of the mountain? It opened in 1981 but was relocated, extended and incorporated into Wonder Mountain for the 1986 season, reopening as Thunder Run. These detailed illustrations depict the new ride concept and theming before it was moved and renamed.

Did you know that unlike most birds that molt just a few feathers at a time, penguins molt their feathers almost all at once?  But not to worry! It's a totally natural and annual process that lasts about 2-4 weeks, and helps them to renew their glossy waterproof coats. Stop by the park during this time of year and you may see some of our Humboldt penguins undergoing this fascinating transformation.

How can you tell male and female sea lions apart? Male california sea lions have a sagittal crest, a defining characteristic for males of this species. This boney structure in their head is fully developed by the time they reach sexual maturity! Our group of sea lions at Marineland are all female.

⁠
This event is catered towards children under 5 and is an additional activity included with a normal Day Pass, and remember, children 3 and under get in free at SkyPark! ⁠
(Please note that parents must remain with their children and supervise them at all times. Toddler Time activities are guided and parental participation is encouraged.)

Join us, along with the Walt Disney Animation Research Library, as we share a look at the artistry, technology, and people that have shaped #100YearsofDisneyAnimation. ✨

Here is what is known to be the oldest piece of artwork in the Walt Disney Animation Research Library's collection, from 'Alice the Firefighter,' one of the Alice Comedies. This animation drawing was originally found while archiving “The Skeleton Dance.”

Dive into an incredible dolphin experience with our Dolphin Exploration! Enjoy hands-on interaction with these amazing animals and float in deep water alongside them while you learn about dolphin care, habitat, and conservation 🐬

Red ruffed lemur baby update! 🎉 Now you can catch a glimpse of the entire red ruffed lemur family in their habitat any day the park is open! 🌿🏞️ 

Fun Fact: Red ruffed lemurs are known for their powerful and melodious vocalizations! Their enchanting calls can carry through the treetops, serving as a unique way to communicate with their family members and establish territory. Listen closely during your visit to hear their mesmerizing tunes! 🎶❤️

Calling all scouts! All scouts and their families are invited to SkyPark at Santa's Village for this great opportunity to earn merit badges August 5th and 6th!
⁠
Discounted Admission:⁠
Admission for Scouts is $24/person (ages 4-12) and $35/person (ages 13+). Kids 3 and under and seniors 75+ receive complimentary park admission. Scout Days discounted tickets must be purchased at the door (not available online). Youth must be in Scout uniform or a Scout t-shirt to receive this special rate. Enjoy mountain biking, hiking, rock climbing, archery, ax throwing & more!⁠
⁠
Tailored Activities: Designed to help meet badge requirements⁠
⁠
California Gold Rush: San Bernardino History, Gold Panning and Geology (additional fee applies for this activity)⁠
⁠
Mountain Biking: Closed-toe shoes and helmet required (bike rentals are available in park for an additional fee)⁠

Swing by Santa's Workshop for all other activities and Scout Days information from 10am-12pm and 12:30pm-3pm each day.

column3:
Here is another summer conservation tip from 🐲 Danny the Dragon! By hopping on a bicycle, you can enjoy a fun, eco-friendly mode of transportation while reducing your carbon footprint and contributing to a healthier, more sustainable world. ☀️Bicycles are powered by human energy, making them one of the most sustainable forms of transportation available. Unlike cars or public transport, bikes don't require fossil fuels or electricity to operate, making them a climate-friendly choice. By opting for a bike, you're making a tangible contribution to combatting climate change. 🌍😎 
🌿 Tips for Bike Riding Bliss: 🚲 
🚴‍♀️ Wear a helmet and follow local road safety regulations to ensure a safe riding experience. 
🚴‍♀️ Plan your routes, explore bike lanes, and discover scenic paths that make your cycling adventures even more enjoyable. 
🚴‍♀️ Incorporate biking into your daily routine by choosing it as a mode of transportation for shorter distances or for running errands.

Happy World Tiger Day! 🐯 On this day, we “paws” to show extra love and appreciation to these beautiful animals. 

Did you know that tigers have unique stripe patterns, much like human fingerprints! No two tigers have the same stripe arrangement, making each one truly one-of-a-kind.🌿🐅

Show your stripes this weekend and come learn more about our tiger friends during our Tigers Tales show today! #WorldTigerDay 🌍🐾

Well hello, dears! Mrs. Claus here with a message from the elves:⁠
⁠
Ready yourselves for the merriest of times with an enchanted offer from SkyPark at Santa's Village! For a jolly price of just $149* per person (usually valued at $225!), you can bask in the pure magic of our Christmas wonderland! 🎄⁠
⁠
Picture a delightful gift box, delivered straight to your home, filled with treasures to ignite your festive spirit! Inside, you'll find a heartfelt letter from Santa, VIP entry wristbands granting you access to Santa's Village for Christmas, marvelous adventure passports, a cherished Santa's Village ornament, and other merry surprises to delight your soul!⁠
⁠
The VIP Experience awaits:⁠
🌟 Skip-the-Line VIP Entry, so you can joyously explore without delay!⁠
🌟 VIP Reservations to Visit Santa, ensuring magical moments with the man in red!⁠
🌟 A delightful Workshop Crafting Session with us, Santa's elves!⁠
🌟 A merry Cookie Decorating Session, because sweet memories are the best kind!⁠
🌟 And that's not all – each person receives an extra Free Day Pass to enjoy the wonders of SkyPark before October 29th, valued at up to $69! ⁠
⁠
Hurry now, for our VIP boxes are limited, and this enchanting 'Christmas in July' sale ends on July 31st! Be wise, and seize this joyous opportunity to save! Regular Day Pass tickets for Santa's Village Christmas season will be available in August.⁠
⁠
Please note that all members in your party must have a pre-purchased VIP wristband to enter through the VIP entrance, except for our littlest elves aged 3 and under, and our seniors, aged 75 and over, who are warmly invited to enter the park for free when accompanied by a VIP party (pre-reserved, of course!). Guests with complimentary access may also choose to upgrade to VIP experiences to receive the delightful gift box offerings! 🎁⁠
⁠
Spread the cheer, share the joy, and embark on a Yuletide adventure like no other! More info in the link in bio.⁠
⁠
With festive cheer and warm wishes,⁠
Santa's Village Elf Team 🧝‍♀️🧝‍♂️

Enter to WIN a 2024 Season Pass to Centreville! 
Contest Dates: Saturday July 29 - Saturday August 19 (4 weeks)

Step 1:  Post and Tag
Post 2 pictures of your family at Centreville during the 2023 season and use the hashtag #centrevillecontest

Step 2: Like and Share
Like this post then share it to your story.

 STEP 3: NAME AND COMMENT
Comment on this post with your 2 suggested names for the baby pigs!

SPECIAL DRAW: if you post/tag 4 photos and use these 4 locations in your tagged photos your entry automatically gets entered into a second draw for an All Day Ride Pass! 
1. Centreville entrance sign   2. Farm sign   3. Near any Farm Animal   4. Any one ride

Rules
winners of the naming contest will be selected by a panel of 4 Judges, including members of the farm team and of the management team.
1 Season Pass given out for each name given to our 2 pigs (2 in total)
1 All Day Ride Pass given out to the contestant who submitted the runner up name for the pigs. 
1 random draw for an All Day Ride Pass for the Special draw
to qualify, all entries must include ALL of the above and be received by midnight August 19th
new names will be announced on our Facebook/Instagram pages on September 2nd 
winners will be contacted  by email and given a certificate to receive a season passes for the 2024 season which can only be redeemed by the winner, in person during the operational dates of the 2024 season = same for the runner up prize and special draw prize. 

Details also posted on our events page @ https://www.centreisland.ca/centreville-amusement-park/news-events/contest-you-could-win-big-1

#contest #photocontest #giveaway #prize #seasonpass #name #farmanimal #centrevillecontest #centrevillefun

column3: Play time is an important part of our animals' day. Our trainers have the important job of coming up with creative enrichment ideas for our animals. The belugas at Marineland seem to enjoy interacting with large balls, retrieving large enrichment items to their trainers, and even enjoy eating sugarless gelatin enrichment. Sometimes, our trainers will even get on top of a large float and hang out with them in the middle of their pool! The animals never know what play time will be like that day, but it's always a fin-tastic time!

Dear Park Guests,
 
We wanted to inform you of some important parking arrangements for Friday July 28, and Saturday, July 29. On these two days, the parking lot at California's Great America will be exclusively reserved for park attendees. Please note that guests attending the Taylor Swift Eras tour at Levi's Stadium will not have access to our parking facilities during this time.
 
To use the parking lot on Friday and Saturday, all individuals in your vehicle must possess a valid park ticket. This means that everyone arriving in the vehicle must have their own park admission ticket in order to utilize the parking facilities.
 
For your convenience, tickets will be available for purchase at the parking toll booths upon arrival. However, to ensure a seamless experience and take advantage of the best offers, we strongly recommend purchasing your tickets online in advance.
 
In addition, tailgating in the California's Great America parking lot is strictly prohibited.
 
We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in following these parking guidelines. We're committed to making your visit to California's Great America a memorable one, and we can't wait to welcome you for an unforgettable weekend of FUN!

Magellanic penguins eat a variety of small fish, but their favourite species is anchovy! They also eat small crustaceans like krill, and even squid! It’s important that we help ensure penguins have enough to eat. We can help penguins out in the ocean by only eating responsibly sourced seafood! Look for the OceanWise or MSC label on your seafood the next time you’re at the grocery store; these certifications mean that the seafood was caught in a way not causing harm to animals and will not harm the ecosystem. This small effort is a HUGE way to help penguins, and all aquatic animals!

Here is another summer conservation tip from 🐲Danny the Dragon! By opting for hang drying instead of using a clothes dryer, you're reducing your energy consumption and cutting down on utility costs. ♻️ Take advantage of the warm summer weather to let the sun do the job, providing a natural and cost-effective alternative. 
🌻 Tips for Successful Hang Drying: 🌞 
🧺 Choose a sunny and well-ventilated area in your backyard or balcony to hang your clothes. 
🧺 Invest in a sturdy clothesline or drying rack that can withstand the summer elements. 
🧺 Shake out your garments before hanging them to minimize wrinkles and ensure faster drying. 
🧺 Arrange your clothes with enough space between each item to allow air circulation. 
🧺 To prevent fading, hang colored clothes inside out or in a shaded area.

The World’s Largest Rubber Duck to Debut in Westchester County for the First Time

Over Six-Story High Mama Duck and Her Duckling to “Splash” at Playland in Rye from July 28 to 30, 2023 

As one of the nation’s most iconic amusement parks celebrating its 95th season, Playland will be the next destination for the traveling largest rubber duck this summer

Rye, NY – July 21, 2023 – Swimming through the ocean waters, The World’s Largest Rubber Duck, along with her baby duckling, will splash onto the shores of the Long Island Sound at Playland from Friday, July 28th to Sunday, July 30, 2023. The 61-foot-high Mama Duck and her 10-foot baby duckling, Timmy, will visit the iconic amusement park following its North American tour with prior stops in Los Angeles, Chicago, Philadelphia, Toronto, and Detroit, Michigan.  Mama Duck and Timmy will join all the fun at Playland Beach and will be the backdrop for ‘quacky’ photo op for families and visitors of all ages, where guests can flap their wings while enjoying music by Playland’s boardwalk DJ. In honor of The World’s Largest Rubber Duck’s arrival, Playland will offer a “Lucky Duck” giveaway at select game prizes  in the amusement park to win a chance for complimentary 2023 season passes for four. 

“We’re thrilled to welcome The World’s Largest Rubber Duck and her duckling to Playland this summer,” said Jeff Davis, General Manager of Playland. “It’s special that this is The World’s Largest Rubber Duck’s first visit to Westchester County. We are also very excited to have partnered with both Pepsi® and two great local Jeep® dealerships to offer our guests the lucky opportunity of getting a brand-new Jeep! We are a park that provides unique experiences for the local community and look forward to more business partnerships. We will continue to expand on our guest offerings and will  announce a variety of new experiences, events, and celebrations.” 

The World’s Largest Rubber Duck and its duckling will be perched at Playland Beach, which also features a 35-foot water slide, volleyball nets, umbrellas, chairs, lounges, and clam shells and  weekend entertainment including live steel drums performances.

Recently reopening for the first time since 2019, Playland Pool features infrastructure improvements, as well as upgrades to the locker rooms, bathhouse, and pool deck. What’s more, brand-new features and amenities are now available with zero depth entry, a dedicated splash zone for younger children, new lounge furniture, and a sundry shop with sunscreen, sunglasses, towels, and swimsuits available for purchase.

For more information and a calendar of events, visit www.playland.com and follow Playland on Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Twitter and LinkedIn.

For more information on The World’s Largest Rubber Duck, visit https://thebigduck.us/ and follow on Facebook and Instagram. 

About Playland
Located in Rye, New York, Playland has been one of the nation's most iconic amusement parks since opening in 1928 with over 40 rides and attractions, creating lasting memories for generations of families. Entering its 95th year of operation as one of the only amusement parks designed in Art Deco architecture, new fun, food and family experiences await at the amusement park and NYC-metro area summer tradition. While guests will feel the adrenaline rush enjoying Playland classics such as the Dragon Coaster and the Derby Racer, several new additions are making a splash at Playland this summer. From new dining experiences such as Tiki Beach and Captain Lawrence Beer Garden to satisfy guests’ appetites and thirst, as well as the brand-new Playland Pool where families can keep cool, the scenic on-site Playland Beach with a new waterfront slide, The Boardwalk at Playland, and paddle boats available on Playland Lake, there’s excitement for everyone in the family to enjoy while loving the panoramic views of Long Island Sound.  For more information, visit Playland.com and follow on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and TikTok.  

Media Contacts
Shin-Jung Hong – ShinJung@nicholaslence.com | Cell: 617-413-7880
Josh Knoller – Josh@nicholaslence.com | Cell: 201-294-9586

Happy #NationalCarouselDay! 🎠

Take a spin of history and celebrate properly on our historic Liberty Carousel! ✨

Our carousel is an antique reproduction that takes us back to the golden age of San Diego! Belmont Park originally opened in 1925, as the “Mission Beach Amusement Center!” 

If you look closely, you can see hand-painted scenes from several iconic San Diego locations! Like The Hotel Del Coronado, and The Spirit of St. Louis flying over the Giant Dipper! 

The hardest decision you’ll make today…which horse are you riding!?

Here is another summer conservation tip from 🐲Danny the Dragon! You can make every outdoor gathering an opportunity to protect our planet 🌎 by choosing eco-friendly items during your picnic or BBQ. 

Here are some fantastic eco-friendly essentials to minimize your environmental impact: 
🌿 Biodegradable plates and utensils: Ditch the plastic and opt for biodegradable alternatives made from bamboo, palm leaf or other sustainable materials. They are sturdy, eco-friendly and can be easily composted after use. 
🌱 Reusable food containers and wraps: Say goodbye to single-use plastic wraps and bags. Invest in reusable food containers and wraps made from silicone, beeswax or organic cotton. Not only do they keep your food fresh, but they also reduce plastic waste significantly.

Ready to test your skills at Princess Evergreen's Archery Range? Improve your archery game with these helpful tips:⁠
⁠
1. Perfect your posture: Stand tall with feet shoulder-width apart and maintain a balanced weight distribution. Keep your shoulders relaxed and avoid any forward or backward leaning.⁠
⁠
2. Master hand placement: Hold the bow with a relaxed grip and position your fingers correctly on the bowstring, making sure it rests on the first joint of your fingers, not in the crease.⁠
⁠
3. Aim small, miss small: Enhance your precision by focusing on a small target or a specific spot on the target. This technique will boost your accuracy and overall performance.⁠
⁠
4. Embrace consistency: Develop a consistent routine for each shot, from your stance to your draw, aim, and release. This practice will build muscle memory and enhance your overall consistency.⁠
⁠
5. Seek feedback: Don't hesitate to ask for feedback from experienced archers or our Outdoor Adventure crew. Their insights can help you identify areas for improvement!⁠
⁠
We hope to see you at the Royal Games! 🏹

Throwback Thursday! Did you know Corkscrew was made in 1975?

Caring for animals looks like so much fun, especially the play time and training sessions our care staff plan through the day. But did you know that our animal care specialists also prepare their diets every single day? 🍽️

Every morning, trainers will thaw and sort through several hundreds of pounds fish to ensure our whales, dolphins, sea lions and penguins recieve a high quality diet! Our land mammal care team will also prepare diets for the bears, deer, and distribute hay for our bison herd. 

Come check out our Trainer Talk at King Waldorf Stadium and our training sessions at Friendship and Arctic Cove to learn more about the food our marine mammals eat and all about the amazing care our trainers provide! Check in on our bears, deer and bison and see what they're chowing on, too!

Everybody has seen (or even heard) a cuckoo clock somewhere - maybe you've seen one while shopping an antique store; perhaps your grandparent's had one in their living-room and the sound of a cuckoo bird brings back fond memories of those times; or for those lucky enough to have visited the Black Forest in Germany, maybe you've visited one of the many cuckoo clockmakers workshops there and seen and heard hundreds of cuckoo clocks! 

When you come to visit us, our Post Office gift shop is where you will find these beautiful German made, Black Forest cuckoos! If you're looking for one-of-a-kind gifts, or something special to bring back old memories these cuckoos will surely make you smile!

Você sabia!?

O Playland foi criado em 1981 pelo Grupo Playcenter, empresa que naquela época operava com grande sucesso o 'Playcenter' - Parque de Diversões que funcionou na cidade de São Paulo entre os anos de 1973 e 2012, acumulando mais de 60 milhões de visitantes e muitas histórias. 😁

Daquela época pra cá a diversão só aumentou! E hoje o Playland e o Playcenter Family (@playcenterfamilyoficial) estão presentes nos principais shoppings em São Paulo e Bahia, com um mix de atrações que encanta e diverte toda a família! 🤩

- Quem se lembra dessa nostalgia? Quem se divertir na época do Playcenter, hoje se diverte com suas famílias aqui no Play! 

- Confira descontos e promoções imperdíveis no Playmania (o e-commerce do Play) e garanta seus créditos para brincar com muita comodidade e segurança - o link está no perfil, não vai perder! 🤑
.
.
.

O Playland é o seu destino nas férias! 📍

E quer saber o motivo que faz do Playland a sua melhor opção para se divertir? Vem descobrir com a gente:

1. TODO MUNDO APROVEITA: O Playland tem atrações onde toda a família aproveita, as crianças se divertem e até os adultos entram na brincadeira! 😎

2. ACESSO DEMOCRÁTICO: A entrada no Playland é GRÁTIS! E você só paga pelas atrações que quiser utilizar - com o uso do cartão Playcard, são diversos combos promocionais para você aproveitar de montão (e economizar) 🤑

3. FÁCIL DE CHEGAR: O Playland está localizado nos principais shoppings em São Paulo e Bahia, tem sempre um Playland pertinho de você. 🚩

4. PRÊMIOS: Além das nossas atrações (brinquedos), no Playland você também encontra dezenas de jogos! São jogos de competição e habilidade, onde a maioria deles liberam tickets conforme sua pontuação, que podem ser trocados por prêmios! 🧸

5. PIPOCA: O passeio ao Playland combina com muitas guloseimas, uma delas é a Pipoca do Play! É a melhor pipoca que você vai experimentar (disponíveis em todas as unidades, exceto Eldorado e Tatuapé) 🍿

São vários os motivos para você vir brincar, chama todo mundo e vem!

- Confira descontos e promoções imperdíveis no Playmania (o e-commerce do Play) e garanta seus créditos para brincar com muita comodidade e segurança - o link está no perfil, não vai perder! 🤑
.
.
.

Do all black bears have black fur? Black bears living in different geographic locations can sometimes have lighter colour fur. They are lighter in colour the further west you go in North America. Typically they have black fur with a lighter brown muzzle.

VIP present from Santa:⁠
A gift-box delivered to your home containing a letter from Santa, VIP entry wristbands to Santa's Village for Christmas, adventure passports, custom Santa's Village ornament and other festive Christmas surprises!⁠
⁠
VIP Experience includes:⁠
*Skip-the-Line VIP Entry⁠
*VIP Reservations to Visit Santa⁠
*Workshop Crafting Session⁠
*Cookie Decorating Session⁠
⁠*One Additional Free Day Pass per person to be used before October 29th!⁠

Can you handle the power of one of the most thrilling rides at California’s Great America?🤩

Did you know Delirium swings you and 31 other riders an astounding 64 feet in the air—over 6 stories high? You’ll be flung 120 degrees in both directions, all while the passenger vehicle spins continuously at up to nine revolutions per minute. If you’re up to the challenge, then it’s time to combine spinning and swinging for one deliriously thrilling ride aboard Delirium!🎢

There are only 49 days left before Labor Day! Come out to Silverwood and make some amazing memories before the 2023 season is gone.

Time to stay sharp and embrace life's quills and thrills! 🎉🦔 Did you know Wild Adventures is home to not just one, but two amazing porcupine species: the African and Indian crested porcupines? These spiky wonders have a unique defense mechanism. When threatened, they can rattle their quills, creating a warning sound that says, 'Don't mess with me!'

Be sure to say hello to Gus, Mikey, Amy, Donny, and Raf today on the Alapaha Trail, in Oasis Outpost, and during special Meet and Greets!

Marine Life is excited to announce the arrival of four African penguins from the Vancouver Aquarium — a significant step in protecting and conserving endangered species. With the Species Survival Plan (SSP), we are part of an international breeding effort to ensure long-term population viability for these incredible animals. We are proud to have hatched 15 penguins over the years and are thrilled to welcome new members to our colony. Let's continue to spread the word about the efforts to protect and conserve endangered species. 

Visit bit.ly/3D9Zjgt for more information about this amazing conservation work being done by Marine Life. #MarineConservation #SpeciesSurvivalPlan  #WildlifeConservation

We have turned National Ice Cream Day into a full week of all things sweet and scary. Dare to join us July 24-30.

International Ice Cream Day is typically celebrated on the third Sunday of July each year. Ice Cream (according to an unofficial elf poll) is without a doubt the perfect dessert ever devised by man. Ice Cream can be used to make sandwiches or entire cakes, or just eaten as a scoop all on its own. ⁠
National Ice Cream Day celebrates this delicious treat, so why not celebrate with us at The Lunch Box? You might even see some familiar faces...🎅🏼🤶🏼🧝🏻🫅🏽👸🏻🧙🏽‍♀️🍄

🍦 HAPPY NATIONAL ICE CREAM DAY! Here is another summer conservation tip from 🐲Danny the Dragon! 🌞 Summer is the perfect time to indulge in a delicious ice cream treat 🍨, but did you know that choosing an ice cream cone can also contribute to a greener planet? Opting for an ice cream cone means saying no to single-use plastic packaging, such as cups and spoons. 🥄By enjoying your favorite frozen delight in a cone, you're reducing plastic waste and helping to combat the global plastic pollution crisis. It's a small change that adds up to make a big difference! 🍦😎

Ssspectacular News! It's World Snake Day! 🐍🎉 Time to slither into the fun and celebrate these legless wonders! Did you know that snakes have a remarkable sense of smell? They use their flickering tongues to gather scent particles, helping them find prey and navigate their surroundings. So, let's hissss and make some noise for these sssensational serpents on their special day! 🌿❤️ #WorldSnakeDay 

📸: Savannah & Kristen, Zoo Keepers

Here is another summer conservation tip from 🐲Danny the Dragon! 🥦 It's time to tantalize your taste buds while making a positive impact on our planet. By dedicating a day of the week to go meatless, you can contribute to a more sustainable and eco-friendly future. The meat industry is a significant contributor to greenhouse gas emissions. ☁️ By skipping meat for a day each week, you're reducing the demand for 🐄 animal agriculture, which in turn helps curb carbon emissions and mitigates climate change. It's a small change that can have a big impact! 
🌿 Tips for a Delicious Meatless Day: 🌱 
🍽️ Experiment with plant-based proteins like tofu, tempeh, legumes or seitan. 
🍽️ Explore a variety of fruits, vegetables, grains and spices to add color and depth to your dishes. 
🍽️ Try international cuisines that naturally feature plant-based recipes, such as Mediterranean, Indian or Asian dishes. 
🍽️ Share your meatless creations on social media, spreading awareness and inspiring others to join the movement.

In honor of #DisabilityPrideMonth, we recognize the input provided by our cast members within ENABLED, a Disney Business Employee Resource Group that promotes respect, equality and appreciation of people with disabilities, towards the reimagining of Mickey’s Toontown. Learn More - http://di.sn/6181P3cFU

Video Slideshow Description: The first image shows a little boy in a wheelchair accompanied by a little girl crossing a bridge at Mickey’s Toontown. Text on the image reads, “Let's explore some changes made to Mickey's Toontown...” The next image shows a father carrying his son while playfully interacting with Goofy. Text on the image reads, “Disney Imagineers received input from the Disneyland disability business employee resource group ENABLED, when reimagining the land.” The next image shows guests walking around the streets of Mickey’s Toontown during the day. Text on the image reads, “Enhancements include virtually cubless streets and braille inclusions on the tree roots in Centoonial Park.” The next image shows a little boy and girl interacting with Donald Duck. Text on the image reads, “Sensory experiences like interactive portholes at Donald’s Duck Pond.” The next image shows little girls splashing water at the Toontown fountain in the center of Centoonial Park. Text on the image reads, “Plus, a balance of stimulating and decompressing activities.” The next image shows a little boy in a wheelchair with his mom dancing next to Pete outside of Goofy’s How to Play Yard. Text on the image continues to read, “Plus, a balance of stimulating and decompressing activities.” The final image shows Minnie Mouse kneeling before two little girls at the entrance of her house. One of the little girls is facing Minnie Mouse at eye level and holding a Minnie Mouse plush toy while the other little girl is at her side. Text on the image reads, “Join us in celebrating Disability Pride Month!”

One of the best things you can do for monarchs and other pollinators is to plant habitat. Even a few plants can make an impact! Monarchs need nectar plants to fuel their breeding and migration and native milkweed to lay their eggs. Looking for helpful resources to get started?

🌱Discover native nectar plants for your area: https://bit.ly/monarch_nectar_plants

A major conservation threat to many animals is the yearly El Niño warming event. This has an affect on Magellanic penguins and their chicks as these weather events cause flooding and cool temperatures, which this southern, temperate climate species are not accustomed to. We can make climate friendly choices every day to help Magellanic penguins. By being mindful of our carbon footprint, using public transport, carpooling, walking and biking, we can positively help fight climate change.

*UPDATE: As of 7/12/23, all volunteer spots are now full. Thank you for all who've reached out to help!

📣 VOLUNTEER OPPORTUNITY! 📣 ⁠
⁠
SkyPark has a big history in our mountains, dating back long before the idea of a Bike Park or Santa's Village was even formed. Our Meadowlands is one of only two meadows in the entire San Bernardino National Forest that boasts the kind of diversity of plant life we have here. There are over 90 medicinal and edible plants within steps of entering the Meadowlands, making it a natural supermarket and pharmacy that most aren't even aware of! ⁠
⁠
As part of our continued conservation efforts, it is necessary to remove invasive species of plants that sneak in so our meadow can thrive. We are looking for volunteers to lend a helping hand with us in preserving the beauty of SkyPark on Saturday, July 22nd. Together, we will protect our delicate ecosystem to ensure it can be enjoyed for future generations. ⁠
⁠
When: Saturday, July 22nd from 9am-12pm (meet at the Safety Office to the left of Admissions)⁠
What to Bring: Gloves, sunscreen protection and plenty of water⁠
What Volunteers Receive: Lunch provided by SkyPark and a free Day Pass to use for a future date (or volunteer 5x and trade in your unused Day Passes for an Annual Pass or renewal)⁠
⁠
⁠*Minors will need to be accompanied by someone 18+ up⁠
⁠
Limited spaces available, RSVP required. Please send us a DM or email Brandon at bfischer@skyparksantasvillage.com if you'd like to join us! ⁠
⁠
Text 'TRAILVOLS' to 31996 to receive text alerts for future volunteer opportunities.

Here is another summer conservation tip from 🐲Danny the Dragon! 🌴 Summer is here, and it's time to soak up the sun responsibly while protecting our vibrant coral reefs. 🐠 By choosing coral reef safe sunscreens, you can enjoy the beach, pool, and outdoor activities while preserving the delicate ecosystems beneath the waves. 🌊 Coral reef safe sunscreens are formulated without harmful chemicals like oxybenzone and octinoxate, which have been found to contribute to coral reef decline. 
☀️Here are some reef safe sunscreen brands: 
🐟 Thinksport SPF 50 Sunscreen 
🐟 Babo Botanicals SPF 30 Clear Zinc Lotion 
🐟 Suntegrity Natural Mineral Sunscreen 
🐟 Raw Elements SPF 30 Certified Natural Sunscreen 
🐟 Stream2Sea SPF 30 Mineral Sunblock 
🐟 Loving Naturals Clear Body SPF 30+ All-natural Sunscreen 
🐟 Banana Boat Simply Protect SPF 50+ Sunscreen (spray, not lotion) 
For more, visit www.hawaii.com/travel-info/reef-safe-sunscreen/

🚨 NEW STUDY ALERT: In conjunction with researchers at University of Lethbridge, Texas A&M, and St. Mary’s University, SeaWorld observed the beluga pod at SeaWorld San Antonio to better understand a particular behavior called mouth-to-mouth interaction. Mouth-to-mouth interactions, or MtMIs, are a type of playful behavior observed in belugas in both human care AND in their natural environment. It is hypothesized that this behavior – which can be characterized as two belugas interlocking their jaws and clasping one another, almost as if they were shaking hands – is used as a way for them to train their social and motor coordination skills. This hypothesis is supported by evidence that younger belugas were more likely to initiate these interactions than adults. Understanding these behaviors helps us to provide better care and enrichment for the animals, and provides us a deeper understanding of their natural instincts and development. 

🎥: Dr. Heather Hill, St. Mary’s University

It's #WorldMeerkatDay! These small animals live in cooperative groups that dig complex tunnel systems throughout their territory. Their bodies are built for digging and seeing great distances. Fun fact: while the group is foraging, a sentry or lookout is always on duty! 💛

The red-ruffed lemur pups are growing up too fast! 😮 They are becoming super strong climbers and starting to catch up to their parents in size! Help us document their growth by tagging us on the lemur pup photos you take and using the hashtag #ruffpupdate ❤️

📸: Keeper Elissa

Here is another summer conservation tip from 🐲Danny the Dragon! 💧 Hydration is key, and it's time to quench your thirst while making a positive impact on the planet. 🌍 By choosing a reusable water bottle, you can stay refreshed on the go while reducing plastic waste, preventing it from ending up in landfills, oceans, or harming wildlife, and supporting a more sustainable future. ♻️ It's a small change that has a big impact!☀️😎

🎅🏼🌲 Celebrate the magic of Christmas in July with our unforgettable VIP Experience! We're offering you an extraordinary opportunity to get a head start on the holiday season at an unbeatable sale price of just $149 per person. Here's everything you need to know about this amazing offer:⁠
⁠
VIP Gift from Santa:⁠
A gift-box delivered to your home containing a letter from Santa, VIP entry wristbands to Santa's Village for Christmas, adventure passports, custom Santa's Village ornament and other festive Christmas surprises!⁠
⁠
*Skip-the-Line VIP Entry:⁠
No more waiting in long lines at the door! As a VIP, you'll enjoy exclusive skip-the-line entry to our Christmas village.⁠
⁠
VIP Reservations to Visit Santa:⁠
Santa Claus eagerly awaits your arrival! With our VIP reservations, you'll have priority access to visit Santa himself.⁠
⁠
Workshop Crafting Session:⁠
Unleash your creativity in our workshop crafting session! Our team of elves will guide you through a hands-on crafting activity.⁠
⁠
Cookie Decorating Session:⁠
Get ready to unleash your inner pastry elf with our cookie decorating sessions.⁠
⁠
One Additional Free Day Pass:⁠
But that's not all! We're thrilled to offer you an additional free day pass to use before October 29th when you purchase your VIP Experience by July 31st. Enjoy a day of Summer/Fall fun with an extra day at SkyPark on the house! ⁠
⁠
Full experience details are available here: https://skyparksantasvillage.com/christmas-in-july-sale-2023/
⁠
Limited spots available. This Christmas in July special VIP price is only valid until July 31st - so get ahead of the game now and save! ⁠Regular Santa's Village Christmas tickets go on sale in August. ⁠
⁠
*All members in your party must have a pre-purchased VIP wristband to enter though the VIP entrance except children 3 and under, and seniors 75 and over who may enter the park FREE when accompanied by a VIP party (pre-reserved). Guests with complimentary access have the option to upgrade to VIP experiences if they wish to receive the gift box offerings.

Reposting as the weather is getting hotter! It is important to have a plan to keep yourself safe from heat-related illnesses. Make sure to drink plenty of water, wear light clothing and a hat, put on sunscreen and take breaks out of the sun. Check on your friends and family and have someone do the same for you. Watch out for these signs and take immediate action to help prevent further illness ☀️👒💦🧑‍🤝‍🧑

It's Tortellini the California desert tortoise's birthday! To celebrate Tortellini's 32nd birthday, here's a video of him coming out of his torpor state this past winter. Torpor is a survival tactic similar to hibernation used by animals to survive during the colder months 🐢

Danny the Dragon 🐲 is excited to share some conservation tips with you this summer! Playing with water toys is a great way to stay cool during the summer heat☀️ By opting for reusable water toys, you're saying goodbye to disposable plastic options that often end up in landfills or pollute our oceans. There are many reusable water toys options from squirt guns, reusable water balloons and even sponges. These toys are great for staying cool but also saving the environment! 😎 ♻️
